## ginkgo-cli config generate

Generate a default config.toml

```
ginkgo-cli config generate [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for generate
  -o, --output string   output path for config.toml
      --overwrite       overwrite existing config (creates a backup)
      --update          merge defaults into existing config (creates a backup)
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   path to config file (yaml|toml)
```
